marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis
Class FrameNoisePartLpc

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.FrameNoisePartLpc
All Implemented Interfaces:
FrameNoisePart
public class FrameNoisePartLpc
extends java.lang.Object
implements FrameNoisePart

LPC based noise modeling for a given speech frame Full spectrum LP coefficients and LP gain are used Synthesis handles noise generation for upper frequencies(i.e. frequencies larger than maximum voicing freq.)

Author:
oytun.turk
